title: Spinach, crab and prawn quiche
ingredients: ['1 shortcrust pastry sheet, rolled', '200g grated Gruyere cheese', '220g tin of crab meat, drained', '250g frozen spinach, thawed and drained', '250g cooked prawns, peeled', '6 eggs', '250ml creme fraiche or single cream', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
